title: The Greedy Old Fat Man
description: A greedy old fat man eats a hundred biscuits and drinks a barrel of milk, but he is still hungry. He meets a little boy, a little girl, a little dog, a little cat and other creatures, gobbling them up as he goes. But a little squirrel leads him to his downfall.

title: The Green Frogs
description: A folktale about two green frogs who always disobey their mother, explaining why green frogs cry out whenever it rains.

title: Sawerigading
description: History of the folktale Sawerigading, legendary hero of Sulawesi; papers of a seminar.

title: El monje y la hija del verdugo
description: "En 1680, el monasterio de Berchtesgaden en los Alpes bávaros fue el escenario del desgraciado amor entre Ambrosio, un joven franciscano, y Benedicta, la hija de un verdugo. Dos siglos más tarde, Ambrose Bierce interpretó los siniestros pormenores de la leyenda hasta convertirla en su única novela y en una de las cimas de la literatura del género. El admirable suspense de estas páginas discurre hacia un desenlace imprevisto, una batalla entre la fe, el deseo, la culpa y la redención. Los esgrafiados labrados por Santiago Caruso, una de las mayores revela-ciones de la gráfica contemporánea, se abisman en esta historia de amor prohibido, destrucción y tragedia. Aunque «decir que se centra el conflicto en la lucha entre Amor y Misión sería generar un gastado déjà vu. Yo lo concibo como una batalla entre Naturaleza y Religión. Pensé entonces en pintar lo animal y lo vegetal invadiendo la percepción de la moral del mundo del Hombre y de Dios»." -- Amazon.

title: The Patient Stone
description: A retelling of the traditional Persian tale of how the patient stone helps a mistreated young girl achieve her true destiny.

title: The Development of an Alabama Folktale
There lived the cat and the rooster
City Mouse-country Mouse and Two More Mouse Tales from Aesop
description: City mouse-country mouse -- The lion and the mouse -- Belling the cat.

title: The Patient Stone
description: A retelling of the traditional Persian tale of how the patient stone helps a mistreated young girl achieve her true destiny.

title: The Lion and the Hare Go Hunting
Legenda Batu Kukumbung
description: CERITA RAKYAT DWIBAHASA ini perlu diketahui dan menarik bagi anak-anak dan semua yang berminat pada cerita rakyat. Ceritanya disajikan dalam bahasa Indonesia dan Inggris. Dengan clemikian, anak-anak tidak hanya menikmati ceritanya, retapi juga dapat belajar bahasa Inggris dengan cepat. Judul-judul serial yang sudah terbit: 1. Legenda Endang Nawangsih ( The Legend of Endang Nawangsih) 2. Legenda Joko Tole (The Legend ofloko Tole) 3. Keong Emas ( The Golden Snail) 4. Saudagar dan Saputangan (The Merchant and a Handkerchief) 5. Telaga Warna (The Multi Coloured Lake) 6. Legenda Banyuwangi (The Legend of Banyuwangi) 7. Leienda Tombak Baru Kelinting (The Legend of The Baru Kelinting) 8. Dukun Bayi dan Nyamuk (The Midwife and The Mosquito) 9. Persahabatan yang Tidak Jujur (Unfair Friendship) 10. Aryo Menak dan Bidadari (Ary0 Menak and The Fairy) 11. Asal Mula Padi (The History of Paddy) 12. Janda Miskin dengan Ikan Gabus (The Old Widow with a Gabus Fish) 13. Kisah Jayaprana clan Layonsari (The Story of Jayaprana and Layonsari) 14. Kisah Si Wuragil (The Story of Si Wuragil) 15. Kisah Kebo Iwo (The Story of Kebo Iwo) 16. Kisah Pak Dungu (The Story of Pak Dungu) 17. Kekuwo dan Kekele (Kekuwo and Kekele) 18. Legenda Situ Bagendit (The Legend of Situ Bagendit) 19. Bunga Batu (Stone Hower) 20. Dongeng Danau Toba (The Legend of Lake Toba) 21. Tiga Bersaudara (Three Sisters) 22. Belalang Tempur (Busy Fighter Crichet) 23. Perang Pisang (The Banana War) 24. Cindelaras (Cindelaras) 25. Batu Gantung (The Hang Stone) 26. Legenda Gunung Geder (The Legend of Geder Mountain)

title: Si Bungsu Katak
description: This Indonesian legend is found in different regions, "in which the hero (heroine) perceived as having unpromising appearance, turns into a human being as he (she) gains a true love."--Prelim.
